fields.name: Matilda Goad
fields.description: Homeware designer Matilda Goad found cult status with her rainbow-hued cutlery and scallop-edged lampshades. In her debut Papier stationery collection, bistro chair-inspired weave patterns meet ice cream parlour hues and her signature scallop waves in a celebration of colourful, carefree summer days.

fields.name: Danielle Kroll
fields.description: When she was nine, Danielle Kroll won acrylic lessons from a local artist and has been painting ever since. The Brooklyn-based designer takes inspiration from her childhood memories, road trips and thrift shops, creating playful designs that'll make your day a little brighter.
